Usage example

Define responsive rules in controller:


                    ctrl.responsiveRules = [
                        { max: 300, size: 'small' },
                        { min: 301, max: 600, size: 'normal' },
                        { min: 601, size: 'large'}
                    ];

Then in template it's possible to use it like this:


                    <div class="responsive" lp-responsive="lp-responsive" size-rules="mainCtrl.responsiveRules">
                        My Responsive Div
                    </div>

Result will be responsive according to defined rules.
